CrystalMaya

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Introduction

Showing materials and CS preview

CrystalMaya is a CrystalSpace exporter for Maya originally written by Dentoid and extended by iceeey.

You can get it from the SVN repository at: https://peragro.org/crystalmaya/trunk/

Features

  • Genmeshes/transforms
  • Export to library
  • Preview window
    • CS preview that syncs with changes made in Maya
  • Materials
    • CrystalMaterial node
    • Loading CS shaders
    • Setting color and texture shadervars
  • Point lights
    • Exports intensity and color
  • Cameras
    • Saves start position, sector (TODO: up vector, direction vector)
  • Textures
    • Loading using CS VFS paths (all CS-supported textures - .dds, .png, .jpg, etc)
  • Load VFS mounts from file
    • Use csVFSCommand -cfg "/native/path/to/your/vfs.cfg" to load mounts.
